title_sort: richard maurice bucke to walt whitman, 19 january 1880
title: Richard Maurice Bucke to Walt Whitman, 19 January 1880
text: Asylum for the Insane,London,JanJanuary 19th 1880My dear WaltI am going to ask a great favor of you—I want you to write me a sketch of your interior life—especially in relation to the conception and elaboration of "Leaves of Grass" The germanancy and path of such a product as "Leaves of Grass" is a psycologicalpsychological expression almost unique in the history of the race and some record of it ought to remain if possible—I need not explain any further what I want from you for you will understand at once what I mean and you must surely have often thought of putting it upon recordI hope that you will take this matter into serious and favourable considerationAnd I amFaithfully yoursR M Bucke Richard Maurice Bucke to Walt Whitman, 19 January 1880
